data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Indore. Through your servants plant 655 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Indore who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, we pray that the county of Indore be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Bhil Mankar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Bhil Mankar people know you.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Indore with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

location.name: Indore
location.people_groups_list: Zamral (Hindu traditions), Kachhi (Muslim traditions), Patlia, Brahmin Malvi, Jhamral
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Zamral (Hindu traditions) (6,900), Kachhi (Muslim traditions) (3,800), Patlia (32,000), Brahmin Malvi (77,000), Jhamral (8,000)
